mapper.insert: insert into hm_host(type, money, create_by, create_time) values (type=#{type},money=#{money},create_by=#{createBy},create_time=#{createTime})
mapper.select: select hm_user.id,hm_user.name,hm_user.nick,hm_user.phone,hm_user.email,hm_user.sex,hm_user.age,hm_user.address,hm_user.status,hm_host.type,hm_host.money,hm_host.create_time,hm_host.create_by from hm_user inner join hm_user_role on hm_user.id = hm_user_role.user_id inner join hm_host on hm_user_role.user_id = hm_host.create_by where hm_user.status = '1'
